ygData.subject: Analysing 60TB of H3 state after 32TB of crawled data
ygData.msgSnippet: We re running a UK domain crawl with a very recent build of Heritrix3. We ve crawled 32TB of WARC.GZ data so far, but the crawler state directory is now
